msg.msgText:
A protocol plug-in can be updated by using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update Plugin help imaserver update Plugin "File=value" imaserver update Plugin "File=value" "PropertiesFile=value" imaserver update Plugin "Name=value" "PropertiesFile=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver update "File=jsonplugin.zip" imaserver update "File=jsonplugin.zip" "PropertiesFile=pluginprops.json" imaserver update "Name=json_msg" "PropertiesFile=pluginprops.json"
Configuration items for the "Plugin" object: Name Name of the protocol plug-in. File Specifies the protocol plug-in zip file name. PropertiesFile Specifies the protocol plug-in properties file name.
NOTES: 1. Enclose each key=value pair within double quotation marks. 2. The Name property is required when the protocol plug-in properties file is specified.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
